body_html: Based on what the Tensorflow website states, as of v1.2 you do not support GPU on Mac, however there have been several people post succesful workarounds. My hope in posting this issue was that it might be something common to other builds and someone could help me get it sorted.
body_text: Based on what the Tensorflow website states, as of v1.2 you do not support GPU on Mac, however there have been several people post succesful workarounds. My hope in posting this issue was that it might be something common to other builds and someone could help me get it sorted.
body: Based on what the Tensorflow website states, as of v1.2 you do not support GPU on Mac, however there have been several people post succesful workarounds. My hope in posting this issue was that it might be something common to other builds and someone could help me get it sorted.
